text: @realDonaldTrump @Twitter You are 1000% correct...this is why the DUMBOCRATS are pushing for it. Have you asked yourself why Pelosi just tweeted all the names of those who succumbed to COVID-19.  The Dems plan on victimizing Covid-19 casualties a 2nd time to cast votes in November. Watch your 6 Potus.
